https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zyVNOTE9PRYGVTDGHzrHWnSAP4H.jpg Tragedy begins with curiosity. The on-line killer website broadcasts scenes of death in real time. Viewers are drawn to the website through curiosity, and then are shocked by what they see. Against their will, random viewers are selected to enter the killing game. It is literally a life and death situation to survive in this cruelest of spectator sports. Death Tube- Broadcast Murder Show
